subject: THE GHANA COMMERCIAL BANK PLC ACCRA GHANA/ CONTACTING YOU FOR YOUR FUNDS TRANSFER
body:
Dear Eliza Dane,
We are contacting you in respect of your compensation funds deposited with
The Ghana Commercial bank for onward transfer to you.The said funds
totalling $3,500,000.00 million united states dollars are deposited in an
escrow account and available for transfer to you now.
We are having 3 different methods of transferring the funds to you and they
are stated below.

1. Bank to Bank wire transfer

2.By bank draft

3. By ATM Master card.

We will be expecting to hear from you soon so we can proceed with the
transfer.
Attached to this email is the deposit documents for confirmation of your
funds with this bank and the identity card of the bank Managing Director as
well as mine that is contacting you.We also attached the proof of funds
document for your perusal.We await your urgent reply to this email

Thanks for banking with us.

Mrs Josephine Danquah
